introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to CampSeeker, a platform dedicated to connecting hikers and property owners. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information when you use our service.

dataCollected.title: 2. Data Collected
dataCollected.content:
When you use CampSeeker, we collect several types of personal data:
- Registration data: such as your name, email address, and password.
- Profile data: such as your profile picture, hiking or lodging preferences.
- Transaction data: information related to your bookings or payments made on the platform.
- Usage data: including login logs, service usage, and interactions with other users.

dataPurposes.title: 3. Purposes of Data Collection
dataPurposes.content:
We use your data for the following purposes:
- Service provision: to enable you to use our platform, make bookings, and connect with property owners.
- User experience improvement: to personalize recommendations and features based on your preferences.
- Security: to protect your data against unauthorized access and ensure platform security.
- Marketing: to send you special offers or updates, if you have consented.

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content:
Your data may be shared with third parties in the following cases:
- Property owners: when you make a booking, certain personal information is shared with hosts to arrange your stay.
- Service providers: we use service providers to process payments, send emails, or analyze platform usage.
- Legal obligations: in case of legal requests or to comply with a legal obligation.

userRights.title: 5. Your Data Protection Rights
userRights.content:
As a user located in the European Union, you have the following rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):
- Access: you can request access to the information we hold about you.
- Rectification: you have the right to correct any inaccurate or incomplete information.
- Erasure: you can request the deletion of your personal data.
- Restriction: you have the right to restrict the processing of your data in certain circumstances.
- Portability: you can request to receive your data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.
- Objection: you have the right to object to the use of your personal data, especially for direct marketing purposes.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your data for as long as necessary to provide our services and for legal or business reasons. Your data will be deleted or anonymized once its use for the original purposes is no longer justified.

dataSecurity.title: 7. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We take the security of your data very seriously. We have implemented technical and organizational security measures to protect your information against loss, unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.

dataTransfer.title: 8. International Data Transfers
dataTransfer.content: Your information may be transferred to countries outside the European Union, where data protection laws may differ from those in your country. In such cases, we ensure that your data receives an equivalent level of protection, notably through standard contractual clauses approved by the European Commission.

policyChanges.title: 9. Privacy Policy Changes
policyChanges.content: We may update this privacy policy at any time. Changes will take effect upon their publication on this page. We encourage you to regularly review this page to stay informed about how we protect your data.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your data protection rights, please contact us at: support@campseeker.com.

content.termination: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the application at any time without notice, particularly in the event of a violation of these terms of use.
